item.text: The Lord said to Noah, “Come into the ark, you and all your household, for I consider you godly among this generation.

You must <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> with you <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">pairs</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="03605" class="">every kind of</st> <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">animal</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="0376" class="">male</st> and its <st data-num="0802" class="">mate</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> kind of <st data-num="02889" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">animal</st>, the <st data-num="0376" class="">male</st> and its <st data-num="0802" class="">mate</st>,

and <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="07651">pairs</st><n id="1" /> of every kind of <st data-num="05775" class="">bird</st> in the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st>, <st data-num="02145" class="">male</st> and <st data-num="05347" class="">female</st>,<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="02421" class="">preserve</st> their <st data-num="02233" class="">offspring</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st> of the <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>.
For in seven days I will cause it to rain on the earth for 40 days and 40 nights, and I will wipe from the face of the ground every living thing that I have made.”
And Noah did all that the Lord commanded him.
Noah was 600 years old when the floodwaters engulfed the earth.

<st data-num="05146" class="">Noah</st> <st data-num="0935 0413">entered</st> the <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st> along with his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, his <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>, and his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons’</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">because of</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04325 03999">floodwaters</st>.

<st data-num="08147 08147">Pairs</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st>, <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> <st data-num="0834 0369 02889">unclean</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st>, <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> <st data-num="05775" class="">birds</st>, and of <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="07430" class="">creeps</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="0127" class="">ground</st>,

<st data-num="02145" class="">male</st> and <st data-num="05347" class="">female</st>, <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05146" class="">Noah</st>,<n id="1" /> just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> had <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> <st data-num="05146" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" />
And after seven days the floodwaters engulfed the earth.

In the six hundredth year of Noah’s life, in the second month, on the seventeenth day of the month—on that day all the fountains of the great deep burst open and the floodgates of the heavens were opened.
And the rain fell on the earth 40 days and 40 nights.
On that very day Noah entered the ark, accompanied by his sons Shem, Ham, and Japheth, along with his wife and his sons’ three wives.

<st data-num="01992" class="">They</st> entered,<n id="1" /> along with <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">living creature</st> after its <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">animal</st> after its <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="07431" class="">creeping thing</st> that <st data-num="07430" class="">creeps</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> after its <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="05775" class="">bird</st> after its <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>, <st data-num="03605 06833">everything</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">with</st> <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="08147 08147">Pairs</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">creatures</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> have the <st data-num="07307" class="">breath</st> of <st data-num="02416" class="">life</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05146" class="">Noah</st>.
Those that entered were male and female, just as God commanded him. Then the Lord shut him in.
The flood engulfed the earth for 40 days. As the waters increased, they lifted the ark and raised it above the earth.

The <st data-num="04325" class="">waters</st> <st data-num="03966" class="">completely</st> <st data-num="01396 07235 05921">overwhelmed</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>, and the <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">floated</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06440" class="">surface</st> of the <st data-num="04325" class="">waters</st>.

The <st data-num="04325" class="">waters</st> <st data-num="03966 03966">completely</st> <st data-num="01396 05921">inundated</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> so that even<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01364" class="">high</st> <st data-num="02022 0834">mountains</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st> were <st data-num="03680" class="">covered</st>.

The <st data-num="04325" class="">waters</st> <st data-num="01396 03680">rose</st> more than <st data-num="02568 06240 0520">20 feet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04605" class="">above</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st>.<n id="2" />

And <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">living things</st><n id="1" /> that <st data-num="07430" class="">moved</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="01478" class="">died</st>, including the <st data-num="05775" class="">birds</st>, <st data-num="0929" class="">domestic animals</st>, <st data-num="02416" class="">wild animals</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="08318" class="">creatures</st> that <st data-num="08317" class="">swarm</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0120" class="">humankind</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Everything</st> on <st data-num="03605 0834 02724">dry land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> had the <st data-num="05397" class="">breath</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="07307 02416">life</st> in its <st data-num="0639" class="">nostrils</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">died</st>.

So the Lord destroyed every living thing that was on the surface of the ground, including people, animals, creatures that creep along the ground, and birds of the sky. They were wiped off the earth. Only Noah and those who were with him in the ark survived.
The waters prevailed over the earth for 150 days.
